title: How to Make a Pallet Bed Frame

steps.title: Get 2 sets of pallets, these are available at any recycling store.
steps.content: Get 2 sets of pallets, these are available at any recycling store. You can even buy these at any supermarket warehouses. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sand the pallets.
steps.content: Sand the pallets. Although you want the rustic effect a little sanding will prevent you from getting splinters. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Paint primer on the pallet's surface.
steps.content: Paint primer on the pallet's surface. [3] X Research source Paint any color you prefer. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Join the two pallets together.
steps.content: Join the two pallets together. [5] X Research source You can cut a small plank and nail them to the sides of the pallets so the two pallets are joined.

steps.title: Add wheels on the corners of the pallets.
steps.content: Add wheels on the corners of the pallets.

steps.title: Get a mattress and sheets and enjoy your rustic bed.
steps.content: Get a mattress and sheets and enjoy your rustic bed.
